channel.title: Running a server 24/7? or as close as possible
channel.description:
Hi, i was wondering if there is a way to host a server 24/7 without my laptop on, is there any sites you can upload to run it or can you buy an external hard-drive with a built in router?
thanks

item.title: Running a server 24/7? or as close as possible
item.dc:creator: @Pure_str433 Pure str433
item.description:
@Pure_str433 wrote:

Ummm, maybe get a hoster or keep ur computer on 24/7 (lol hard bill)
and get a auto restarter? im not sure about the other things O.o

Read full topic
item.source: Running a server 24/7? or as close as possible
